TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: ID of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: ID of the user of the last change

SEARCH.ROLE.LABEL: Roles
SEARCH.ROLE.TOOLTIP: Search Roles in Identity Access Management (IAM)

USER.LABEL: User
USER.TOOLTIP: Search Users in Identity Access Management (IAM)

CRITERIA.ID: IAM ID, If used then other search criteria will be ignored
CRITERIA.USERNAME: IAM user name, Search by part of name supported
CRITERIA.LASTNAME: IAM last name, Search by part of name supported
CRITERIA.FIRSTNAME: IAM first name, Search by part of name supported
CRITERIA.EMAIL: IAM E-Mail Adresse, Search by part of address supported

PERMISSIONS.SLOT_NOT_DEFINED: No component is defined for this slot.

TOOLTIPS.ID: IAM User ID, used as reference within Permission Mgmt and User Profile Mgmt
TOOLTIPS.REALM: In which realm the user is created.
TOOLTIPS.ORIGIN: Additional information that can be set, for example, when importing the user.

TOOLTIPS.CRITERIA: Searching text in role name and description

CHANGE_PASSWORD.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: Change the password for current user
CHANGE_PASSWORD.NO_PERMISSION: You do not have permissions to change password

CONFIRM_DIALOG.TITLE: Confirm password change
CONFIRM_DIALOG.MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to change your password?

CHANGE_PASSWORD.PASSWORD_CHANGE_ERROR: An error has occurred, the password has not been changed

VALIDATION.FORM_INVALID: The data are not ready to store.

ERRORS.PARSE_ERROR: Parse error: The contained structure does not match the expected format.
ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: Your input does not match the required pattern
ERRORS.FILETYPE_PATTERN_ERROR: Your file does not match the allowed filetypes: .png, .jpg, .jpeg

HTTP_STATUS_0.USER: Unknown problem retrieving User data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.REALMS: Unknown problem retrieving Realm data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.ROLES: Unknown problem retrieving Role data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_400.USER: Your request could not be processed.
HTTP_STATUS_400.REALMS: Your request could not be processed.
HTTP_STATUS_400.ROLES: Your request could not be processed.

HTTP_STATUS_401.USER: You are not authorized to see Users.
HTTP_STATUS_401.REALMS: You are not authorized to see Realms.
HTTP_STATUS_401.ROLES: You are not authorized to see Roles.

HTTP_STATUS_403.USER: You have no permissions to see Users.
HTTP_STATUS_403.REALMS: You have no permissions to see Realms.
HTTP_STATUS_403.ROLES: You have no permissions to see Roles.

HTTP_STATUS_500.USER: Unknown server problem retrieving User data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.REALMS: Unknown server problem retrieving Realm data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.ROLES: Unknown server problem retrieving Role data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_504.USER: Timeout retrieving User data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_504.REALMS: Timeout retrieving Realm data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_504.ROLES: Timeout retrieving Role data - please try again.
